tutorialEntries:
Another thing you can do is control multiple knights sequentially. As of now you can only move one of them at a time, but you will learn how to control them both simultaneously later.
Note that you can only ever create as many Knights as allowed in the current level!

To do that, we must first create a new Knight and move him away from the spawn. Then we can create another Knight just like before except that he needs another name. Not every Knight can be named "knight" or "lancelot"...

When you have done as described, we come to our next mechanic. See the pressure plate with the red border? Step on it with your first knight and you will be able to walk through the gate with the other.
(But dont let the first one leave the pressure plate while the other one stands in the gate. It wont be pretty...)
